page.title: 01Parts of Tonbridge & Malling
page.content: The area covers parts of the parishes of Aylesford, Ditton, East Malling and Larkfield, Leybourne and West Malling. The northern portion is mainly residential and dissected by the A20 Maidstone to London road. The M20 motorway and the river Medway pass through the NE corner. Further south lies the Maidstone to Victoria railway line. Along the A20 is the ribbon development so typical of the era between the two World Wars. During the past 30 years new housing estates have enveloped the older residential areas. The southern part is predominantly fruit farming with growers enticing people to "Pick your own". Here too, East Malling Research Station, with its carefully tended acreage, snuggles discreetly into the landscape.
